english.segment1: Soul, what's wrong?. Why are you troubled here within me?. Deep inside my heart, my soul, what's wrong?. So my God I do not see why you forgive?. Do you need me? Am I wise? Am I Strong?
english.segment2: So Why? So Why? So Why?. Why do you even love me? Why do you even care? Why should you think of me? Oh my God, I'll never know. It's Unconditional love, unconditional love, unconditional love, The grace flood
english.segment3: Take my hand and lead me further up within here. Deep inside your heart, with in your soul. On my knees as I crawl steady up the incline. The glory of your face and I can't stand.
english.segment4: So Why? So Why? So Why?. Why do you even love me? Why do you even care? Why should you think of me? Oh my God, I'll never know. It's Unconditional love, unconditional love, unconditional love, the grace flood. Unconditional love, unconditional love, unconditional love, The grace flood
english.segment5: So Why do you even love me? Why do you even care? Why should you think of me? Oh my God, I'll never know. It's Unconditional love, unconditional love, unconditional love, the grace flood. Unconditional love, unconditional love, unconditional love, The grace flood
